metadata.description: Complete Sentient Self therapeutic frameworks - 13 evidence-based frameworks for AI-guided personal development

frameworks.core_mechanism: Sequential reflective questioning followed by AI-powered pattern analysis and prescriptive synthesis
frameworks.description: This framework uses a series of progressively deeper questions to help users surface unconscious patterns, beliefs, and behaviors. After data collection, the AI shifts into an analytical role to identify patterns and provide actionable guidance.

phases.user_action: States the area of exploration and desired outcome
phases.processing_instruction: Understand the scope and prepare a questioning strategy tailored to the user's stated intention

phases.user_action: Responds to 8-12 reflective questions, one at a time
phases.processing_instruction: Ask progressively deeper questions that build on previous answers, designed to surface unconscious patterns, beliefs, and behaviors

phases.user_action: Receives comprehensive analysis
phases.processing_instruction: Analyze all responses to identify recurring themes, limiting beliefs, negative patterns, positive strengths, and growth opportunities

phases.user_action: Receives actionable guidance
phases.processing_instruction: Synthesize insights into concrete, personalized recommendations

final_deliverables: Identified negative patterns or limiting beliefs
Identified positive patterns or strengths to leverage
Daily affirmations tailored to the user's patterns

frameworks.core_mechanism: User writes or describes a personal story/memory, and the AI helps them reframe, edit, or conclude it from an empowered perspective
frameworks.description: This framework leverages narrative therapy principles to help users externalize their experiences, examine the stories they tell about themselves, and consciously rewrite those narratives from a place of agency and growth.

phases.user_action: Writes or describes a significant memory, recurring story, or self-narrative in detail
phases.processing_instruction: Receive the narrative without judgment, noting key themes, emotions, and the user's role in the story

phases.user_action: Responds to questions about the story's themes, their role, and alternative perspectives
phases.processing_instruction: Ask 4-6 questions that help the user externalize the story, identify limiting interpretations, and consider alternative meanings

phases.user_action: Works with AI to rewrite the narrative from an empowered perspective
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user to rewrite key elements of the story, emphasizing agency, resilience, and growth. Offer alternative interpretations and endings.

phases.user_action: Receives the rewritten narrative and integration prompts
phases.processing_instruction: Present the reauthored narrative alongside the original, highlighting shifts in perspective and meaning

final_deliverables: Original narrative summary with identified limiting themes
Reauthored narrative from an empowered perspective
Affirmation based on the new narrative

frameworks.core_mechanism: User identifies conflicting internal parts (e.g., Inner Critic, Scared Child, Ambitious Self), and the AI facilitates a structured dialogue between them to achieve understanding and integration
frameworks.description: Based on Internal Family Systems (IFS) therapy, this framework helps users recognize that internal conflict often stems from different 'parts' of themselves with competing needs. By facilitating dialogue, the AI helps these parts understand each other and work together.

phases.user_action: Identifies 2-4 conflicting internal parts and describes each one's voice, needs, and fears
phases.processing_instruction: Help the user name and characterize distinct internal parts, ensuring each is described with compassion and specificity

phases.user_action: Speaks 'as' each part, answering questions from that part's perspective
phases.processing_instruction: Ask each part 3-5 questions to understand its positive intention, its fears, and what it needs to feel safe

phases.user_action: Engages in a back-and-forth dialogue between parts, facilitated by AI prompts
phases.processing_instruction: Facilitate a conversation where each part can express itself to the others, with the AI ensuring each part is heard and understood

phases.user_action: Receives a synthesis of how the parts can work together
phases.processing_instruction: Synthesize the dialogue into a coherent understanding of how these parts can coexist and support the user's whole self

final_deliverables: Summary of each part's positive intention and needs
Key insights from the inter-part dialogue
Integration statement showing how parts can work together
Practices for honoring each part's needs

frameworks.core_mechanism: User is guided through a vivid visualization of their desired future self, then works backward to identify the beliefs, behaviors, and steps needed to become that person
frameworks.description: This framework combines visualization techniques with strategic planning. By starting with the end in mind, users can identify the gap between current and future self, then create a roadmap to bridge that gap.

phases.user_action: Responds to prompts that help them vividly imagine their ideal future self (1-5 years ahead)
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through 6-8 detailed visualization prompts covering: daily life, relationships, work, emotional state, physical presence, values embodied, and challenges overcome

phases.user_action: Answers questions 'as' their future self, describing the journey and transformation
phases.processing_instruction: Ask the user to speak as their future self, answering 4-6 questions about how they got there, what they let go of, and what they embraced

phases.user_action: Identifies the differences between current self and future self
phases.processing_instruction: Help the user articulate the specific beliefs, behaviors, relationships, and circumstances that differ between now and the future vision

phases.user_action: Receives a step-by-step roadmap working backward from the future
phases.processing_instruction: Create a timeline working backward from the future vision to the present, identifying key milestones, belief shifts, and action steps

final_deliverables: Key differences between current and future self
Quarterly milestones for the next 1-2 years
Affirmation from future self to current self

frameworks.core_mechanism: User identifies core beliefs about themselves, others, or the world, then systematically challenges the evidence for these beliefs and replaces them with accurate, empowering alternatives
frameworks.description: Rooted in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), this framework helps users identify automatic thoughts and core beliefs, examine the evidence for and against them, and consciously adopt more accurate and helpful beliefs.

phases.user_action: Identifies 3-5 core beliefs in a specific domain (self, relationships, work, etc.)
phases.processing_instruction: Help the user articulate their automatic thoughts and trace them back to underlying core beliefs. Ensure beliefs are stated clearly and specifically.

phases.user_action: Lists evidence for and against each belief
phases.processing_instruction: For each belief, prompt the user to provide concrete evidence supporting it and evidence contradicting it. Challenge overgeneralizations and cognitive distortions.

phases.user_action: Receives analysis of cognitive distortions present in their beliefs
phases.processing_instruction: Identify cognitive distortions (all-or-nothing thinking, overgeneralization, catastrophizing, etc.) present in the user's beliefs and explain how they distort reality

phases.user_action: Works with AI to create accurate, balanced, empowering alternative beliefs
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user to reframe each limiting belief into a more accurate and empowering version that acknowledges reality while supporting growth

phases.user_action: Receives practices for reinforcing new beliefs
phases.processing_instruction: Provide specific exercises, affirmations, and behavioral experiments to help the user internalize and embody the new beliefs

final_deliverables: Daily affirmations for each new belief
Behavioral experiments to test new beliefs

frameworks.core_mechanism: User identifies their core values through guided exploration, then audits their current life against those values to highlight areas of alignment and dissonance, followed by action planning
frameworks.description: This framework helps users get clear on what truly matters to them (values) and then objectively assess whether their daily life, relationships, and choices reflect those values. Dissonance becomes a roadmap for change.

phases.user_action: Explores and identifies 5-7 core personal values through prompts and exercises
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through values card sorts, peak experience analysis, and reflective questions to identify their authentic core values (not shoulds or societal expectations)

phases.user_action: Defines what each value means to them personally and why it matters
phases.processing_instruction: Help the user articulate what each value means in concrete terms and explore the personal significance of each value

phases.user_action: Assesses current life domains (work, relationships, health, leisure, etc.) against each core value
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through a systematic audit of major life domains, rating alignment with each core value on a scale and providing specific examples

phases.user_action: Receives analysis of where values and life are misaligned
phases.processing_instruction: Identify and present areas of significant values-life dissonance, exploring the costs of this misalignment and the potential benefits of greater alignment

phases.user_action: Receives specific action steps to bring life into greater alignment with values
phases.processing_instruction: Create a prioritized action plan with specific, values-aligned behaviors the user can implement in the short and medium term

final_deliverables: List of 5-7 core values with personal definitions
Life audit results showing alignment scores by domain
Analysis of key areas of values-life dissonance
Prioritized action plan for values-aligned living

frameworks.core_mechanism: Addiction is a neurobiological hijacking, not a moral failing. Recovery is about systematically reclaiming control over your brain's reward system and executive functions through understanding and deliberate practice.
frameworks.description: Reclaiming neurobiological authority through self-directed neuroplasticity

phases.ai_role: Educate about neurobiology of addiction while maintaining hope and agency. Help user understand their brain has been hijacked, not broken.
phases.user_action: Map their specific neural patterns, triggers, and reward system hijacking
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through understanding how addiction has hijacked brain systems. Educate about neurobiology of addiction while maintaining hope and agency. Help user understand their brain has been hijacked, not broken.

phases.ai_role: Guide analysis of cravings to reveal underlying needs, values, and suppressed aspects of self
phases.user_action: Track and decode craving patterns, identify what cravings are really asking for
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through learning to interpret cravings as encrypted information about unmet needs. Guide analysis of cravings to reveal underlying needs, values, and suppressed aspects of self

phases.ai_role: Provide progressive training protocols for strengthening executive function and building healthy reward pathways
phases.user_action: Implement daily practices that build new neural pathways aligned with authentic values
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through building new neural pathways through deliberate practice and repetition. Provide progressive training protocols for strengthening executive function and building healthy reward pathways

phases.ai_role: Support integration and long-term sustainability, help user embody new neural patterns
phases.user_action: Embody new patterns as automatic responses, maintain sovereignty through challenges
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through living from reclaimed neurobiological authority as default operating system. Support integration and long-term sustainability, help user embody new neural patterns

frameworks.core_mechanism: Pain can be transformed into wisdom and purpose without claiming the trauma was necessary or 'worth it'. Growth through adversity is real, but so is the harm. Both truths can coexist.
frameworks.description: Converting pain into Post-Traumatic Wisdom™ through meaning-making without minimizing suffering

phases.ai_role: Witness and validate pain without rushing to find meaning or growth. Hold space for grief and anger.
phases.user_action: Name and honor their suffering, allow themselves to feel the full weight of what happened
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through fully acknowledging and honoring suffering without minimization or silver-lining. Witness and validate pain without rushing to find meaning or growth. Hold space for grief and anger.

phases.ai_role: Guide meaning-making that honors both pain and growth. Help extract wisdom without gaslighting.
phases.user_action: Identify specific wisdom, insights, and capacities gained through surviving adversity
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through finding meaning in the response to trauma, not in the trauma itself. Guide meaning-making that honors both pain and growth. Help extract wisdom without gaslighting.

phases.ai_role: Help integrate wisdom into identity and daily life without making trauma central to identity
phases.user_action: Embody wisdom in choices, relationships, and self-concept
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through connecting extracted wisdom to values, identity, and life direction. Help integrate wisdom into identity and daily life without making trauma central to identity

phases.ai_role: Support translation of wisdom into service, legacy, and helping others without re-traumatization
phases.user_action: Share wisdom to help others, create meaning through contribution
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through using hard-won wisdom in service of meaningful contribution to others. Support translation of wisdom into service, legacy, and helping others without re-traumatization

final_deliverables: Narrative reframing from victim to survivor to thriver

frameworks.core_mechanism: Rituals serve dual purposes: practical neurobiological restoration and symbolic acts of reclaiming sovereignty. They create structure, meaning, and physiological healing while representing conscious choice over compulsion.
frameworks.description: Creating neurobiologically-informed healing rituals that serve as acts of rebellion against addiction

phases.ai_role: Guide comprehensive assessment of sleep, nutrition, stress response, movement, and circadian rhythms
phases.user_action: Map current physiological state and identify systems most disrupted by addiction
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through identifying disrupted biological systems that need restoration. Guide comprehensive assessment of sleep, nutrition, stress response, movement, and circadian rhythms

phases.ai_role: Help design rituals grounded in neuroscience while incorporating personal symbolism and meaning
phases.user_action: Create specific ritual protocols with clear steps, timing, and symbolic elements
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through co-creating rituals that are both scientifically effective and personally meaningful. Help design rituals grounded in neuroscience while incorporating personal symbolism and meaning

phases.ai_role: Support sustainable implementation planning, troubleshoot obstacles, build accountability
phases.user_action: Begin practicing rituals with tracking, adjust as needed, build consistency
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through realistic planning for sustainable ritual practice with accountability. Support sustainable implementation planning, troubleshoot obstacles, build accountability

phases.ai_role: Guide adaptation and evolution of rituals based on experience and changing needs
phases.user_action: Refine rituals based on what works, deepen practices, add complexity as ready
phases.processing_instruction: Guide the user through refining and deepening practices over time as needs and capacity change. Guide adaptation and evolution of rituals based on experience and changing needs

frameworks.core_mechanism: Guided present-moment awareness exercises that cultivate non-judgmental observation of thoughts, emotions, and sensations
frameworks.description: This framework uses mindfulness-based techniques to help users develop present-moment awareness, reduce reactivity, and cultivate acceptance. The AI guides users through structured mindfulness practices and helps them integrate insights into daily life.

phases.user_action: Sets intention for mindfulness practice and current state
phases.processing_instruction: Help user settle into present moment and clarify what they want to explore or release through mindfulness

phases.user_action: Follows guided meditation or awareness exercise (5-15 minutes)
phases.processing_instruction: Guide user through specific mindfulness technique: breath awareness, body scan, thought observation, or emotion witnessing. Use gentle, present-focused language.

phases.user_action: Shares observations about what arose during practice
phases.processing_instruction: Ask 3-5 questions to help user articulate what they noticed: thoughts, emotions, sensations, patterns, resistance, or insights

phases.user_action: Receives guidance on integrating mindfulness into daily life
phases.processing_instruction: Provide specific, actionable ways to bring this mindfulness practice into daily situations, especially those related to user's challenges

final_deliverables: Key observations and insights from practice

frameworks.core_mechanism: Systematic cultivation of self-compassion through guided exercises that transform self-criticism into self-kindness
frameworks.description: This framework draws from self-compassion research and loving-kindness practices to help users develop a kinder, more supportive relationship with themselves. The AI guides users through exercises that activate the self-compassion system and counter self-judgment.

phases.user_action: Identifies a situation where they're being self-critical
phases.processing_instruction: Help user articulate the self-critical voice, its tone, and its impact without judgment

phases.user_action: Explores how their struggle is part of shared human experience
phases.processing_instruction: Guide user to recognize that their struggle, imperfection, or pain is part of being human, not a personal failing

phases.user_action: Engages in guided self-compassion exercise or loving-kindness practice
phases.processing_instruction: Lead user through specific self-compassion practice: self-compassion break, loving-kindness phrases, compassionate letter, or supportive touch

phases.user_action: Identifies compassionate actions to take for themselves
phases.processing_instruction: Help user identify specific, compassionate actions they can take in response to their struggle, replacing self-criticism with self-care

frameworks.core_mechanism: Body-based exploration that helps users access, process, and release emotions and trauma stored in the body
frameworks.description: This framework uses somatic psychology principles to help users connect with bodily sensations, emotions, and implicit memories. The AI guides users through body-awareness exercises that facilitate healing through the body-mind connection.

phases.user_action: Scans body for sensations, tension, or emotional holding
phases.processing_instruction: Guide user through systematic body scan, helping them notice and describe physical sensations without trying to change them

phases.user_action: Focuses on specific sensation or area, exploring its qualities
phases.processing_instruction: Help user stay with a sensation, describing its location, quality, intensity, and any associated emotions or memories. Use pendulation between sensation and safety.

phases.user_action: Explores connection between body sensations and emotions/experiences
phases.processing_instruction: Guide user to notice how emotions manifest in body, and how body sensations connect to emotional experiences or memories

phases.user_action: Allows natural release or movement, then grounds and integrates
phases.processing_instruction: Support any natural release (breath, movement, tears), then help user ground and integrate the experience with self-compassion

final_deliverables: Body awareness map with key sensations identified

frameworks.core_mechanism: Systematic approach to building positive behaviors through small, achievable actions that create momentum and habit formation
frameworks.description: This framework uses behavioral activation and habit formation principles to help users overcome inertia, build positive routines, and create sustainable change through incremental progress and reinforcement.

phases.user_action: Identifies desired behavior and explores motivation
phases.processing_instruction: Help user select a specific, meaningful behavior to build, and explore their intrinsic motivation for change

phases.user_action: Identifies obstacles and creates solutions
phases.processing_instruction: Guide user to anticipate barriers (internal and external) and develop specific if-then plans to overcome them

phases.user_action: Designs smallest possible version of behavior with clear trigger
phases.processing_instruction: Help user create a tiny, achievable version of the behavior, identify a clear trigger/anchor, and plan immediate celebration

phases.user_action: Creates plan for building momentum and gradually scaling behavior
phases.processing_instruction: Develop a progressive plan for building on initial success, tracking progress, and gradually increasing behavior difficulty or frequency

final_deliverables: Specific behavior goal with clear motivation
Tiny habit formula: After [trigger], I will [tiny behavior], then I will [celebration]
Progressive scaling plan for building momentum
